column1: The Mass of the Christian Burial will be held on Saturday at 11:00 AM at St. Joseph Shrine Catholic Church in the Irish Hills with burial to follow in the church cemetery with Fr. Robert Pienta officiating.  The family will receive friends at the Desnoyer Funeral Home on Friday
column3: 2015 from 2-8 PM and on Saturday at the church from 10:00-11:00 AM. A Rosary Service will be held at the funeral home on Friday
